newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Great Plains Software.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Great Plains Software.

text.p: Hambrecht & Quist Inc Thursday said it started coverage of Great Plains Software, a maker of client/server financial software, with a buy rating.
-- estimated the company will earn $0.53 a share on revenue of $72.3 million in 1998 and $0.70 a share on revenue of $93.9 million in 1999.
-- said company has attractive market growth opportunity as companies seek new technologies for the "Year 2000" problem in which computer clocks must be reset.
-- said shifting revenue mix to higher value products and consistent third party distribution should improve margins.
